DataTableHeadings.summary: Create table headings from a DataTable.

DataTableHTML.summary: Creates an HTML table from a DataTable.
DataTableHTML.param: The maximum number of rows to display.

DataTableRows.summary: Creates table rows from a DataTable.
DataTableRows.param: The maximum number of rows to display.

DataHeadings.summary: Create table headings from a data object.

DataHTML.summary: Create an HTML table from a collection of data objects.
DataHTML.param: The maximum number of rows to display.

DataRows.summary: Create table rows from a Data Object.
DataRows.param: The maximum number of rows to display.

items.ResultHeadings:
Create table headings from a DbResult object.
The data result object. The TextState object." The HTML table headings row.
items.ResultHTML:
Creates an HTML table from a DbResult object.
The data result object. The TextState object." The maximum number of rows to display. The HTML table.
items.ResultRows:
Create table rows from a DbResult object.
The data result object. The TextState object." The maximum number of rows to display. The HTML table rows.
